scripts.setup:db: npm --prefix backend run cf-typegen && cd backend && npx wrangler d1 create polyu-calendar-db
scripts.db:migrate:local: cd backend && npx wrangler d1 execute polyu-calendar-db --file=./schema.sql --local
scripts.db:migrate:remote: cd backend && npx wrangler d1 execute polyu-calendar-db --file=./schema.sql --remote
scripts.deploy:frontend: npx wrangler pages deploy frontend --project-name polyu-calendar-web
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
